%---------------------------------
% Set and Number Definitions
%---------------------------------

% Natural numbers
\newcommand{\N}{\mathbb{N}}

% Real numbers
\newcommand{\R}{\mathbb{R}}

% Extended real numbers
\newcommand{\Rextend}{\overline{\mathbb{R}}}

% Powerset of a set
\newcommand{\powerset}[1]{2^{#1}}

% Borel sigma-algebra
\newcommand{\borel}[1]{\mathcal{B}\left(#1\right)}

% Sigma-algebra generated by a set
\newcommand{\generateSigmaAlg}[1]{\sigma \left[#1\right]}

\newcommand{\sigmaAlg}{\texorpdfstring{$\sigma$}{sigma}-álgebra }
\newcommand{\sigmaAlgs}{\texorpdfstring{$\sigma$}{sigma}-álgebras }

%---------------------------------
% Mathematical Operations
%---------------------------------

% Absolute value
\newcommand{\abs}[1]{\left| #1 \right|}

% Norm
\newcommand{\norm}[1]{\left\lVert #1 \right\rVert}

% Equivalence class
\newcommand{\eqclass}[1]{\left[ #1 \right]}


\newcommand\restr[2]{{% we make the whole thing an ordinary symbol
  \left.\kern-\nulldelimiterspace % automatically resize the bar with \right
  #1 % the function
  \littletaller % pretend it's a little taller at normal size
  \right|_{#2} % this is the delimiter
  }}

\newcommand{\littletaller}{\mathchoice{\vphantom{\big|}}{}{}{}}
